briefdescription.para: Shape rotation is synced with text rotation.
Shape rotation is offset from text rotation.
Shape rotation is a fixed angle.
Methods for determining the rotation of the background shape.
Rectangle.
Square - buffered sizes only.
Ellipse.
Circle.
SVG file.
Background shape types.
Shape size is determined by adding a buffer margin around text.
Fixed size.
Shape size is determined by percent of text size.
Methods for determining the background shape size.
Copy constructor.
Returns the blending mode used for drawing the background shape.
Returns whether the background is enabled.
Returns the color used for filing the background shape.
Returns the join style used for drawing the background shape.
Returns the offset used for drawing the background shape.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are determined via offsetUnit().
setOffset()
offsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale object for the shape offset.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the offsetUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
setOffsetMapUnitScale()
offsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the shape's offset.
Returns the background shape's opacity.

detaileddescription.para:
The opacity is a double value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (totally opaque).
setOpacity()

briefdescription.para: Returns the current paint effect for the background shape.
Returns the radii used for rounding the corners of shapes.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are retrieved through radiiUnit().
setRadii()
radiiUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale object for the shape radii.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the radiiUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
setRadiiMapUnitScale()
radiiUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the shape's radii.
Reads settings from a layer's custom properties (for QGIS 2.x projects).
Read settings from a DOM element.
Returns the rotation for the background shape, in degrees clockwise.
Returns the method used for rotating the background shape.
Sets the blending mode used for drawing the background shape.
Sets whether the text background will be drawn.

parameterdescription.para: set to true to draw background

briefdescription.para: Sets the color used for filing the background shape.
Sets the join style used for drawing the background shape.
Sets the offset used for drawing the background shape.

detaileddescription.para:
Units are specified using setOffsetUnit().
offset
offset for shape
offset()
setOffsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale object for the shape offset.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the offsetUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
scale
scale for shape offset
offsetMapUnitScale()
setOffsetUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the shape's offset.
Sets the background shape's opacity.

parameterdescription.para: opacity as a double value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (totally opaque)

briefdescription.para: Sets the current paint effect for the background shape.

parameterdescription.para: paint effect. Ownership is transferred to the background settings.

briefdescription.para: Sets the radii used for rounding the corners of shapes.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if type() is set to QgsTextBackgroundSettings::ShapeRectangle or QgsTextBackgroundSettings::ShapeSquare.
radii
QSizeF representing horizontal and vertical radii for rounded corners. Units are specified through setRadiiUnit()
radii()
setRadiiUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale object for the shape radii.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the radiiUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
scale
scale for shape radii
radiiMapUnitScale()
setRadiiUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the shape's radii.
Sets the rotation for the background shape, in degrees clockwise.
Sets the method used for rotating the background shape.
Sets the size of the background shape.

detaileddescription.para:
The meaning of the size depends on the current sizeType(), e.g., for size types of QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizeFixed the size will represent the actual width and height of the shape, for QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizeBuffer the size will represent the horizontal and vertical margins to add to the text when calculating the size of the shape.
size
QSizeF representing horizontal and vertical size components for shape
size()
setSizeType()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale object for the shape size.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the sizeUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
scale
scale for shape size
sizeMapUnitScale()
setSizeUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the method used to determine the size of the background shape (e.g., fixed size or buffer around text).
Sets the units used for the shape's size.

detaileddescription.para:
This value has no meaning if the sizeType() is set to QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizePercent.
unit
size units
sizeUnit()
setSizeType()
setSize()

briefdescription.para: Sets the color used for outlining the background shape.
Sets the width of the shape's stroke (stroke).

detaileddescription.para:
Units are specified through setStrokeWidthUnit().
strokeWidth()
setStrokeWidthUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the map unit scale object for the shape stroke width.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the strokeWidthUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
scale
scale for shape stroke width
strokeWidthMapUnitScale()
setStrokeWidthUnit()

briefdescription.para: Sets the units used for the shape's stroke width.
Sets the path to the background SVG file.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if type() is set to QgsTextBackgroundSettings::ShapeSVG. The path must be absolute.
file
Absolute SVG file path
svgFile()

briefdescription.para: Sets the type of background shape to draw (e.g., square, ellipse, SVG).
Returns the size of the background shape.

detaileddescription.para:
The meaning of the size depends on the current sizeType(), e.g., for size types of QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizeFixed the size will represent the actual width and height of the shape, for QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizeBuffer the size will represent the horizontal and vertical margins to add to the text when calculating the size of the shape.
setSize()
sizeType()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale object for the shape size.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the sizeUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
setSizeMapUnitScale()
sizeUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the method used to determine the size of the background shape (e.g., fixed size or buffer around text).
Returns the units used for the shape's size.

detaileddescription.para:
This value has no meaning if the sizeType() is set to QgsTextBackgroundSettings::SizePercent.
setSizeUnit()
sizeType()
size()

briefdescription.para: Returns the color used for outlining the background shape.
Returns the width of the shape's stroke (stroke).

detaileddescription.para:
Units are retrieved through strokeWidthUnit().
setStrokeWidth()
strokeWidthUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the map unit scale object for the shape stroke width.

detaileddescription.para:
This is only used if the strokeWidthUnit() is set to QgsUnitTypes::RenderMapUnit.
setStrokeWidthMapUnitScale()
strokeWidthUnit()

briefdescription.para: Returns the units used for the shape's stroke width.
Returns the absolute path to the background SVG file, if set.
Returns the type of background shape (e.g., square, ellipse, SVG).
Write settings into a DOM element.
Container for settings relating to a text background object.
